name: Chart
headline: Realtime Access to Verified Tax Records
description: Chart's Unified Tax Record API provides a direct bridge to tax records from the IRS, state tax agencies, and major tax preparation platforms such as TurboTax and H&R Block.

founders.name: Fatih Celikbas, Founder
founders.description:
Building the only real-time API for verified tax data.

Previously at Meta.
Yale 20'

# Instant Access to Verified Tax Records
Unlock the most complete data on your clients’ financials from the ultimate source of truth - the IRS
[Get Started](https://trychart.com/</contact-sales>)
Trusted by innovative fintech companies and financial institutions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6728f37b87875a1caf64b0e4/672920c28315974ce2dbfe9f_01.avif)

![trychart interface](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6728f37b87875a1caf64b0e4/6729f334a65857751b919db2_home-screenshot.avif)
## Built for Modern Fintechs
Chart empowers innovative fintechs to automate income verification and client onboarding. From flexible integration methods to lightning-fast performance and high-touch support, we deliver an industry-leading experience.
[Go to API Docs![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6728f37b87875a1caf64b0e4/6729fa37bb56d454c48bf2fe_lucide_arrow-up.svg)](https://trychart.com/<http:/developer.trychart.com>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6728f37b87875a1caf64b0e4/672923fa1215ddd8b94f948a_01.svg)
### Real-time Access
Access client tax records instantly. With Chart's direct connection to the IRS and leading tax preparation platforms, get the information you need within **seconds**!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6728f37b87875a1caf64b0e4/672923fa26bcf3db06a4bdf1_02.svg)
### Verified Documents
Eliminate uncertainty with official tax records. Chart directly connects to government sources and leading tax software, providing verified documents you can rely on.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6728f37b87875a1caf64b0e4/672923fa7713943501b8c560_03.svg)
### Structured JSON
Chart transforms tax documents into clean, organized JSON data. Our automatic OCR processing parses records into well-formed JSON, making it easy to integrate to your tools.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6728f37b87875a1caf64b0e4/672923fa4e2c74b33c997883_04.svg)
### Developer-Friendly
Chart provides a developer-centric REST API, complete with SDKs, sandbox environments, and top-tier documentation. Join leading fintech innovators who leverage our tools to build the future of finance.
## Provide multiple submission options for your clients
Provide your clients with flexibility. They can submit their records by connecting to their IRS Online Accounts, linking their tax preparation software, or simply filling out official IRS forms.
![TryChart integration options](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6728f37b87875a1caf64b0e4/672926128124028f5ac4900c_img.avif)
## Enterprise-Grade Security
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6728f37b87875a1caf64b0e4/672923fa1215ddd8b94f948a_01.svg)
### Non-Persistent Credentials
We prioritize your users' security by never persisting their credentials. Every session demands re-authentication, keeping sensitive information transient.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6728f37b87875a1caf64b0e4/672923fa26bcf3db06a4bdf1_02.svg)
### SOC2 II Compliant
Chart is SOC 2 Type II compliant, ensuring the highest standards of data security and privacy. Reports available upon request.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6728f37b87875a1caf64b0e4/672923fa7713943501b8c560_03.svg)
### Granular Access
Your users navigate a consent flow where they choose exactly which documents to share. Taxpayers have full control and can request the removal of their data at any time.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6728f37b87875a1caf64b0e4/672923fa4e2c74b33c997883_04.svg)
### PII Reduction
Protect privacy without compromising functionality. Chart offers the option to anonymize and obfuscate PII and custom fields upon request.
## Ready to Get Started?
Book a call with us to get started! Learn why established financial institutions and innovative fintechs alike choose Chart to effortlessly collect client tax records.
[Book a Demo![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6728f37b87875a1caf64b0e4/6729fa37bb56d454c48bf2fe_lucide_arrow-up.svg)](https://trychart.com/<https:/calendly.com/trychart/demo>)
![GIF](https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/ibvhsaiz82ntstz185hag/widget.gif?rlkey=1pm2dkgt04nxnfjfp7xrf8rlk&raw=1)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6728f37b87875a1caf64b0e4/67292939d73b2690f3fa6efd_Logo.svg)
## Comprehensive Client Financials Instantly Available

generated_description:
**Chart: Revolutionizing Access to Tax Records**  

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator Batch W23, Chart is on a mission to provide real-time access to verified tax records. Located in a currently unlisted area, this small but ambitious team of three is led by Group Partner Dalton Caldwell.  

Chart’s flagship product, the Unified Tax Record API, connects users directly to tax records from the IRS, state tax agencies, and major tax preparation platforms such as TurboTax and H&R Block. This means businesses can automate income verification and streamline client onboarding processes, all while ensuring the data is both accurate and secure.  

The company positions itself squarely within the fintech sector, appearing under tags like 'finops', 'fintech', and 'finance'. They cater specifically to modern fintech companies, offering flexibility in how client records are submitted—whether through IRS accounts, tax preparation software, or official IRS forms.  

### Key Features  

1. **Real-time Access**: Clients can access their tax records within seconds, thanks to Chart's direct connection to the IRS and key tax platforms.
  
2. **Verified Documents**: Rely on official tax records, as the API connects directly to government sources.

3. **Structured Data**: Tax documents are transformed into clean, organized JSON format, making integration hassle-free for developers.

4. **Security First**: With non-persistent credentials and SOC 2 Type II compliance, Chart ensures the highest data security and privacy standards. Users maintain control over what documents they share, and sensitive information can be anonymized upon request.

For companies looking to enhance their financial operations by leveraging tax data, Chart presents a compelling solution. They offer developer-friendly REST APIs, comprehensive documentation, and a commitment to protecting client data.  

If you’re interested in exploring what Chart can do for you, they invite you to [book a demo](https://trychart.com/<https:/calendly.com/trychart/demo>) or visit their site at [trychart.com](https://trychart.com). In a world where data is crucial, Chart is paving the way to seamless access and maximum trust in client financials.
